pullRequest.title: Allows custom blocks to use the fluid overlay texture
pullRequest.bodyText: Currently in FluidBlockRenderer the check for if the fluid overlay should be used is hardcoded to glass and stained glass. This PR moves it to a method that can be overridden so as to allow for mods with custom glass blocks (or blocks of a similar concept), to be able to use the fluid overlay texture when in the fluid instead of using the flowing texture.
